title: Help Us Break Clash!

embed.description: We're ready for a one-day test in Oceania, and we hope you are too! In our last update, we announced PBE tests for Clash. These have now been completed and - from those tests - we improved the game flow and created a recovery tool which gives us the confidence to test these changes on a larger scale (more on this below).

body:
The Clash test is on its way and we need you to help us break the thing! During the [test](https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/help-us-test-clash-weekend)) If you find any bugs, errors or downright crazy stuff please leave a comment below with the following:

1. The Summoner Name you were using
2. Your Clash team name
3. The problem you encountered

Doing so will help us identify any issues on the road to getting the thing (Clash) to a good state (released)! 

Thanks (cheers)!

replies.body:
i am bagel
Backstreet Naegers

game failed to go into champ select after scouting phase and we were immediately put in the consolation bracket. we're currently "waiting for opponent" and hoping the game starts this time ^_^

> [{quoted}](name=i am bagel,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lwEA3Y46,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-10-13T08:54:36.707+0000)
>
> i am bagel
> Backstreet Naegers
> 
> game failed to go into champ select after scouting phase and we were immediately put in the consolation bracket. we're currently "waiting for opponent" and hoping the game starts this time ^_^

Heya I am Bagel. After looking into it one of your players wasn't eligible to play Clash because their account didn't meet the requirements to take part in the test (as specified in the article above).
all 5 of our players had honor 5, verified sms and a rank
all players met the requirements - accounts were verified, all ranked, all honor level 2+

> [{quoted}](name=i am bagel,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lwEA3Y46,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2018-10-13T09:32:10.394+0000)
>
> all players met the requirements - accounts were verified, all ranked, all honor level 2+

Hm, there's a flag on one of the accounts in there. But with both those prerequisites met then that shouldn't matter and this could in fact be a bug. We have a team digging deeper into it now! 

Sorry that this means you've missed out on the games tonight, but thanks so much for being legends and helping report the error.
We made a ranked flex lobby and it said one of our players had been banned and we were unable to start. But then he relogged and he wasn't banned and it was sweet, a bug not related to clash?

> [{quoted}](name=jboc,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lwEA3Y46,comment-id=00000000000100000000,timestamp=2018-10-13T09:55:31.721+0000)
>
> We made a ranked flex lobby and it said one of our players had been banned and we were unable to start. But then he relogged and he wasn't banned and it was sweet, a bug not related to clash?

JBOC were you in the same game as I Am Bagel?
yep talking about Fuzzah Bear

So basically we waited over an hour for nothing to happen. We didn't get to play clash at all TWICE. We got minimal rewards, and TBH the teams we were vsing weren't that great. Billion dollar company btw
Which accounts were flagged? Because we have screenshots proving we are all eligible.

> [{quoted}](name=Mexícan,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lwEA3Y46,comment-id=00000000000100000001,timestamp=2018-10-13T09:56:51.078+0000)
>
> So basically we waited over an hour for nothing to happen. We didn't get to play clash at all TWICE. We got minimal rewards, and TBH the teams we were vsing weren't that great. Billion dollar company btw

Sorry it was a rough experience for you. TBH it doesn't sound great at all. As this was a test there was a possibility of a few things not quite clicking and unfortunately that happened to you and your crew – which really sucks. On the bright side: the majority of games went well in this test, and this case might help us work out this specific issue so it never happens again!

> [{quoted}](name=i am bagel,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lwEA3Y46,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2018-10-13T09:32:10.394+0000)
>
> all players met the requirements - accounts were verified, all ranked, all honor level 2+

Are you able to get your teammate Fuzzah Bear to submit their logs as a player support ticket please? This way we can get to the bottom of this! it's in C: > Riot Games > Logs and then if you could send us the ones around the time you left scouting phase and missed champ select. This will help us work out what happened here and make sure it doesn't happen again. Player Support link is: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

This is an optional test but, in order to help, all Clash test participants must have a Rank on Summoner's Rift and at least Honor level 2.
All requirements were met by all players
Is there clash tonight?

> [{quoted}](name=JupiterR,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lwEA3Y46,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-10-14T02:52:49.801+0000)
>
> Is there clash tonight?

No Clash last night, sorry JupiterR. This was a one night test. We're taking steps to scale this, so keep an eye out for the full weekend tests which'll be coming soon.

I am Newguy73
Team Toxic Turtles

In our first game, we were on the red side for the pick/ban phase but then when we got in the game we had changed to the blue side. Bit of a strange bug, please fix

> [{quoted}](name=Newguy73,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lwEA3Y46,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-10-13T10:22:36.198+0000)
>
> I am Newguy73
> Team Toxic Turtles
> 
> In our first game, we were on the red side for the pick/ban phase but then when we got in the game we had changed to the blue side. Bit of a strange bug, please fix

We've looked into this and it's a legit bug. Thanks for the visibility! It's patched to be fix going ahead.
2nd this. Our second match we had first pick and we were supposed to be on blue side. Then when we got into game we were red side. Kind of weird as we planned for invade as if we were blue side .

* Magıc
* Christian Roblox Server


* Happened the first game. I was banning. A few seconds into champion select my client had the "disconnected" message pop-up with the option to exit instead. I didn't click or touch anything. A few moments later I bug splatted. I closed the bugsplat message and re-opened up the client. Entered my log in and I got stuck on the 'Authorizing... ' message. After a minute or two client said I didn't have internet connection (my internet was 100% fine). Second log in attempt was successful, took me back to the clash homepage for a few seconds then back into champion select. I had missed two bans. Second clash match was fine, didn't have any issues in champion select.

> [{quoted}](name=Magıc,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lwEA3Y46,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2018-10-14T03:20:45.283+0000)
>
> * Magıc
> * Christian Roblox Server
> 
> 
> * Happened the first game. I was banning. A few seconds into champion select my client had the "disconnected" message pop-up with the option to exit instead. I didn't click or touch anything. A few moments later I bug splatted. I closed the bugsplat message and re-opened up the client. Entered my log in and I got stuck on the 'Authorizing... ' message. After a minute or two client said I didn't have internet connection (my internet was 100% fine). Second log in attempt was successful, took me back to the clash homepage for a few seconds then back into champion select. I had missed two bans. Second clash match was fine, didn't have any issues in champion select.

Thanks for the info here, Magic!

The Summoner Name you were using: ManifestedAura
Your Clash team name: INTRICATEX GAMING
The problem you encountered: I didn't receive the summoner icon even when we won our bracket. Some people in our team received it while Soarus Alpha and I did not.

> [{quoted}](name=ManifestedAura,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lwEA3Y46,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-10-13T11:15:02.867+0000)
>
> The Summoner Name you were using: ManifestedAura
> Your Clash team name: INTRICATEX GAMING
> The problem you encountered: I didn't receive the summoner icon even when we won our bracket. Some people in our team received it while Soarus Alpha and I did not.

Hey, can you check your loot tab? Scroll down scroll down to the icon section below your chests, keys, champion shards, etc. You have to click on it to activate it (same with shards and skins). 

If it's not there, please file a Player Support Ticket as you shoulda got it!

Ticket link: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
Its in your loot the place where you open chests you scroll down there an unlock in
assuming clash aint on

> [{quoted}](name=Qgbx,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lwEA3Y46,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2018-10-14T07:50:06.073+0000)
>
> assuming clash aint on

This Clash was just a one night test QGBX. Keep an eye out for full weekend tests (coming soon).

Summoner name: CloudTemplar
team name: untoppable btw

We won all 2 games but I did not receive the "tournament beta winner - 4 team" icon while everyone else in my team did.
At the post-game screen, I got the message saying I unlocked the icon but when I checked my icons, it was not there.
I thought i didnt get mine too but i found it in the loot tab next to store and you scroll down to the icon section below your chests, keys, champion shards, etc

You have to click on it and unlock it like what you do with shards and skind shards.
But it free :)

> [{quoted}](name=CloudTemplar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lwEA3Y46,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-10-13T11:50:21.155+0000)

Hey CloudTemplar, can you re-log into the client and see if it's there? If not, please send a ticket to player support (and tell your friend too) as you should have got those icons! 
Ticket link below:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

1. The Summoner Name you were using: lol ok haha
2. Your Clash team name: BAMSICLLALY THE MOMKEYS
3. The problem you encountered: For some reason me and my teammates (all living in different areas) were experiencing a constant 100-150 ping in our second game. None of us typically experience this lag without reason in other League game modes, so thought it was perhaps worth reporting here.

Summoner Name- Alkalí
Clash Team Name- Poro Protection Agency (PPA)
Problem- Upon entering lane my game was disconnected, i tried to reconnect. But it still wouldn't reconnect. I double-checked the router and all was well, computer was saying my connection was stable.  I restarted my computer and league, that didn't work either.

I am sorry if this is a simple fix, this has never happened to be before, I just froze in lane. Then was disconnected. I could go onto the client but no longer reconnect to the game.

> [{quoted}](name=Alkalí,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lwEA3Y46,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-10-13T08:59:12.352+0000)
>
> Summoner Name- Alkalí
> Clash Team Name- Poro Protection Agency (PPA)
> Problem- Upon entering lane my game was disconnected, i tried to reconnect. But it still wouldn't reconnect. I double-checked the router and all was well, computer was saying my connection was stable.  I restarted my computer and league, that didn't work either.
> 
> I am sorry if this is a simple fix, this has never happened to be before, I just froze in lane. Then was disconnected. I could go onto the client but no longer reconnect to the game.

Heya Alkalí, after looking at things in the backend the disconnection looks to be due to an external connection issue not related to League of Legends.
